items.title: Sam Altman addresses ‘bumpy’ GPT-5 rollout, bringing 4o back, and the ‘chart crime’
items.description: The Reddit AMA got spicy as users peppered OpenAI with questions, and some asked the company to bring back its previous model.

items.title: RIP, Microsoft Lens, a simple little app that’s getting replaced by AI
items.description: Microsoft is killing Lens, a handy mobile scanning app with over 90 million downloads.

items.title: Former Googlers’ AI startup OpenArt now creates ‘brain rot’ videos in just one click
items.description: OpenArt launched a new feature to help creators make AI-generated brain rot videos.
